name: MINImax Tinyverse
description: 'Be a GOD' Real-Time Battle Chess! Watch over and lead your favorite champions as they battle for the glory of Tinyverse. Help them win by playing your miracles and deploying minion troopers in real-time! Tiny Realms Await!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Intel Core2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvdia GeForce GT 7600 DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 750 Ti DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
